entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:43 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 10:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening then north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
